channel.title: Project Dungeon Fest error
channel.description:
hello, im not sure what the problem is, but maybe on of you will... im using project dungeon fest, and it appears everythings working, server says its online in the run CMD and the client loads up... but when i go to loggin it says "error connecting to server"... i made sure i was connecting to localhost, but idk whats wrong, any ideas on this one?
[code][2012/03/18 14:24:17] [Project DungeonFest]: Project DungeonFest framework [2012/03/18 14:24:17] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded 15558item prices. [2012/03/18 14:24:17] [Project DungeonFest]: Loading Server GUI... [2012/03/18 14:24:18] [Project DungeonFest]: Reading mapdata... [2012/03/18 14:24:18] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded mapdata. [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: Setting up Project DungeonFest worl d... [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: Loading clans.... [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded 0 TkoScape clans. [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .ConversionException: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NP C as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.N PC as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: actReferenceUnmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.ja va:77) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .collections.CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:68)
[2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters .collections.CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:61) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:81) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.Abstr actReferenceUnmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeU nmarshaller.start(TreeUnmarshaller.java:142) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.Abstr actTreeMarshallingStrategy.unmarshal(AbstractTreeMarshallingStrategy.java:33) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.un marshal(XStream.java:907) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.un marshal(XStream.java:893) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fr omXML(XStream.java:845) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.rs2hd.model.World.setEngine(Wor ld.java:394) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.rs2hd.Server.<init>(Server.java :73) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: com.rs2hd.Main$1.run(Main.java:36) [2012/03/18 14:24:22] [Project DungeonFest]: java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:72 2) [/code]
this is the server code... is it running?

item.title: Project Dungeon Fest error
item.dc:creator: @dubble0jon dubble0jon
item.description:

hello, im not sure what the problem is, but maybe on of you will… im using project dungeon fest, and it appears everythings working, server says its online in the run CMD and the client loads up… but when i go to loggin it says “error connecting to server”… i made sure i was connecting to localhost, but idk whats wrong, any ideas on this one?
